content_text: I am Full Stack software developer in .NET, SQL, React and Typescript.

Programming always had my interest and started to study it to further improve my productivity and quality of work. Focused on scripting and data analysis at first, and switching to development after realizing the potential it has for creating the future technologies and the challenges that it provides.
Before I used to work as a CAD designer and analyst of CFD/FEM thermal/structural simulations in the aerospace industry.
I am also a pilot of airplane. Speak spanish and a bit of italian and portuguese.
